alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:23PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Laramie County through 500 PM MDT... At 422 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Federal, or 20 miles northwest of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Laramie County. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 21 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
